text: 6.13 Lom 7.5, 12.1, Epe 2.5, 5.14, Kol 3.5, Jem 4.1 Pen tap si tap tɨmel mubwak nɨbop ma kod yonɨmuŋ, ñɨn tob nɨbop okok lɨpɨg dad amek tap tɨmel ma gɨnɨmɨb. Nɨbi pen binɨb kumɨl tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨl koŋɨm mɨdebal tek okok mɨdebɨm. Anɨgɨl mɨdebɨm anɨb ak tek, mubwak nɨbi ke dɨl God nop ñɨnɨmɨb. Pen God ne mubwak nɨbop kod mɨdɨl, ñɨn tob nɨbop ak gek, yɨpɨd gɨl gɨtep gɨnɨmɨb tek lup.
